sourcesContent:
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators} from "@angular/forms"; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.css'] }) export class SignupComponent implements OnInit{ signUpForm!: FormGroup; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder){}; ngOnInit(): void { this.signUpForm = this.fb.group({ email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], noSiren: ['', [Validators.required]], password: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6), Validators.maxLength(40)]], confirmPassword: ['', [Validators.required]], }); } onSubmit() { // Handle form submission logic here console.log(this.signUpForm.value); } }
Inscription

Veuillez remplir les informations suivantes

Password
Confirm Password
